Articles.Content:
Hi,

While going through the final Mun training centre operations, a piece of regolith seems to be trailing wherever I go. Depending on the level of zoom and pop in, the regolith does interact with my spacecraft and forces it to collide. (let me know if you want further info...)

https://imgur.com/a/qXHxAU9
Lol. It looks like it's the same problem with the KSC popping randomly in space, or even in the KSC (the vertical KSC problem)
